New Records: Oklahoma City Thunder won their franchise-record 13th consecutive regular-season game
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 29 points and the Thunder won 116-98 over the Clippers
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 29 points and the Thunder win 13th in a row
Miscellaneous Highlights: OKC leads 3-0 in the regular season series
